Enterprise-Level CLE Solutions
for Your Entire Legal Team

Is your legal team overwhelmed by the continual changes and extensive knowledge required in the legal field?

 

NBI ensures your team remains current and educated, offering CLE courses on state-specific changes, courtroom strategies, business skills, and leadership development.  

 

NBI’s unlimited CLE subscription provides access to over 3,000 practical, engaging, and directly applicable courses on real-world legal challenges. Embrace a lifetime of learning with diverse formats that keep your team captivated and informed.

Diverse Learning Formats for Your Legal Team

Empower your legal team to cover skills gaps, continue their education, and develop new strategies with our diverse course formats.
 
With our unlimited CLE subscription, your team can access a variety of course formats, letting each member select the courses that best suit their needs.

Unlimited Live CLE Courses

Our live courses cover the latest legal trends and developments, offering opportunities for interaction and immediate application of knowledge.

Unlimited Downloadable CLE

Download CLE courses and access them offline. This format means your team can continue their education even without internet access, providing flexibility and convenience.

Unlimited OnDemand CLE Courses

Your team can access an extensive library of on-demand CLE courses at their convenience, ensuring continuous professional development.

Unlimited State-Specific CLE Courses

Stay compliant with state-specific CLE courses tailored to meet the legal education requirements.

Unlimited Ethics & Specialty CLE Courses

Enhance your team’s expertise with our specialized courses covering ethics and other essential legal topics

Unlimited Paralegal Content

Support your paralegals with unlimited courses to improve their skills and stay current with legal practices.

Request Your Demo

Advance Your Legal Practice with Business Skills

When attorneys earn their law degrees, they often envision practicing law, not running a business. Yet, managing a law firm requires wearing multiple hats.
 
  NBI’s unlimited CLE subscription offers courses designed to develop essential business skills. These courses help lawyers navigate the complexities of legal practice and business management, ensuring their firms thrive.

 

Access exclusive CLE courses to strengthen your expertise:

Business Management Skills

Master strategies for managing a thriving small firm, from financial planning to client acquisition, ensuring your practice operates efficiently and profitably.

Explore Business Management Courses

Workflow Efficiency

Learn the benefits of a client-centered workflow to improve office efficiency and client satisfaction, enabling your team to work smarter, not harder.

Explore Workflow Efficiency

Business Expertise

Gain fluency in fundamental business principles, from effective marketing to strategic planning, to better manage and grow your legal practice.

Explore Business Expertise Courses
